trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ822_02850_SEQ_00<tab>Godafre appears in need of some tight-lipped assistance.
TEXT_STMBDZ822_02850_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the unheavy package to Godafre.
TEXT_STMBDZ822_02850_GODAFRE_000_000<tab>Godsdammit... This'll all fall through without the goods, but how am I supposed to get there and back without─
TEXT_STMBDZ822_02850_GODAFRE_000_001<tab>Bloody hells, where did you spring from!? Bah, never mind that─can you keep your mouth shut, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>?
TEXT_STMBDZ822_02850_GODAFRE_000_002<tab>I've a package hidden away over in Specula Imperatoris, and I need someone discreet to go and fetch it for me.

TEXT_STMBDZ822_02850_GODAFRE_000_003<tab>Don't let its size dissuade you─the thing's as light as air. I'd head over there myself, you know, but if folk were to spot me it would cause <var 1A 02 /var>complications<var 1A 01 /var> for future dealings. Well, go on! There's a reward in it for you!
TEXT_STMBDZ822_02850_GODAFRE_000_004<tab>The package is in a secluded corner of Specula Imperatoris. Try to slip in and out with no one the wiser if you can manage it, eh?
TEXT_STMBDZ822_02850_GODAFRE_000_020<tab>Aye, that's the stuff! You've done this sort of thing before, eh?

TEXT_STMBDZ822_02850_GODAFRE_000_021<tab>I see what you're thinking: “What's in this big package that weighs next to naught?” Well, I'd better satisfy your curiosity before you start asking questions to the wrong people. It's tobacco, my friend─made right here in Radiata.

TEXT_STMBDZ822_02850_GODAFRE_000_022<tab>I used to be a porter for the imperials, you see, carting supplies around all day until my back was screaming. The officers would complain about their military-issue pipeweed, so I started earning myself a few small luxuries by smuggling in Radiata's best. On the quiet, of course.
TEXT_STMBDZ822_02850_GODAFRE_000_023<tab>And I'd appreciate it if you could keep quiet, too. I mean to sell to the Resistance forces next, and they'd best not know about my previous customers.
TEXT_STMBDZ822_02850_GODAFRE_000_025<tab>Here's the reward I promised you. Half for the job, and half to keep your lips sealed, understand?
